info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 18 at 11:56AM MDT until April 18 at 12:15PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1215 PM MDT FOR NORTHERN SALT LAKE AND SOUTHEASTERN DAVIS COUNTIES... At 1156 AM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Bountiful, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Salt Lake City, West Valley City, Murray, Bountiful, Taylorsville, South Salt Lake, North Salt Lake, Centerville, Woods Cross, Summit Park, West Bountiful, Emigration Canyon, Millcreek, Kearns, Salt Lake City International Airport, Magna, Canyon Rim, East Millcreek, Oquirrh and Mount Olympus. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 302 and 321. Interstate 80 in Utah between mile markers 107 and 138. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
